00023 #ifdef USE_OVERO_LINK_TELEMETRY
00024 #include <string.h>
00025 
00026 uint8_t overo_link_telemetry_insert_idx;
00027 uint8_t overo_link_telemetry_extract_idx;
00028 uint8_t overo_link_telemetry_buf[OVERO_LINK_TELEMETRY_BUF_SIZE];
00029 
00030 uint8_t overo_link_telemetry_get(char* buf, int len) {
00031   int8_t available = overo_link_telemetry_insert_idx - overo_link_telemetry_extract_idx;
00032   int8_t nb_put;
00033   /* we don't cross circular buffer end */
00034   if (available >= 0) {
00035     nb_put = Min(available, len);
00036     memcpy(buf, &overo_link_telemetry_buf[overo_link_telemetry_extract_idx], nb_put);
00037     overo_link_telemetry_extract_idx += nb_put;
00038   }
00039   /* we cross circular buffer end */
00040   else {
00041     available += OVERO_LINK_TELEMETRY_BUF_SIZE;
00042     nb_put = Min(available, len);
00043     uint8_t first_put =  OVERO_LINK_TELEMETRY_BUF_SIZE - 1 - overo_link_telemetry_extract_idx;
00044     memcpy(buf, &overo_link_telemetry_buf[overo_link_telemetry_extract_idx], first_put);
00045     overo_link_telemetry_extract_idx += nb_put;
00046     if (first_put < nb_put) {
00047       memcpy(&buf[first_put], &overo_link_telemetry_buf[0], nb_put - first_put);
00048       overo_link_telemetry_extract_idx -= OVERO_LINK_TELEMETRY_BUF_SIZE;
00049     }
00050   }
00051   return nb_put;
00052 }
00053 
00054 #endif /* USE_OVERO_LINK_TELEMETRY */
